## raw 
# This subfolder has 11 csv files
`fd0b25fb-ca96-469d-b103-75a1a9737d12_Data`: Trade (% of GDP) from WDI
`ef199ab8-5622-479a-ac78-3c81678fe8db_Data`: Individuals using the Internet (% of population) from WDI
`fe3ba000-c22a-442d-b14a-150b8ebb0d04_Data`: Energy use (kg of oil equivalent per capita)
`3b393571-3769-446b-8a79-c591be497b98_Data`: GDP per capita (constant 2015 US$) from WDI
`ed44d45b-73bc-40c4-af99-2737916812f9_Data`: Carbon dioxide (CO2) emissions excluding LULUCF per capita (t CO2e/capita) from WDI
`08991918-fd28-4b39-9ab5-47a2294938ed_Data.csv`: Manufacturing value added (% of GDP)
`9f252d98-47a9-4552-a76c-c3e9d7b86dd7_Data.csv`: Renewable energy consumption (% of total energy consumption)
`geo_cepii.csv`: Country level fixed attributes from CEPII 

`IMF_classifiaction.xlsx`: The excel file containing country classification as 'Advanced' and 'Emerging and Developing' is generated from this IMF webpage, https://www.imf.org/en/Publications/WEO/weo-database/2025/april/groups-and-aggregates#oem

`DF_TRADE.csv`: This file contains the Greenhouse Gas Footprints (GHGFP): Emissions embodied in bilateral trade from here, 
 https://data-explorer.oecd.org/?tm=DF_ICIO_GHG_TRADE_2023
Unit of measure: Tonnes of CO2-equivalent
This file downloaded from OECD is more than 2GB in size. Reproduction requires downloading the datasets from the above mentioned link. 
  
## cleaned
`pollution_trade.csv`: This is a panel data consisting all the variables needed for further analysis
`advanced_economies.csv`: List of advanced economies among the countries
`developing_economies.csv`: List of developing economies among the countries
